<h2 className="c-primary">Testable Criteria 6.1.0: Lack of Diverse Model Offerings</h2>
<h3>Outcome: Diversity of business models will provide consumers with diverse product offerings and drive innovation.</h3><br/>

<table style={{border:"1px solid black", borderCollapse:"collapse"}}>
  <tr>
    <td style={{border:"1px solid black", borderCollapse:"collapse", padding: "0px 15px 0px"}}>
      <b className="c-secondary">6.1.1\) Question</b><br/>
      Does the AI company offer a diverse range of business models for its AI models, including both open-source and closed-source options, to provide a wide array of choices for consumers, and to drive innovation across the market?
    </td>
    <td style= {{border:"1px solid black", borderCollapse:"collapse", padding: "0px 15px 0px"}}>
      <b className="c-secondary">Relation to Outcome</b><br/>
      AI company to consider providing both open and closed source models to drive innovation and provide more choices for consumers.
    </td>

<h2 className="c-primary">Testable Criteria 6.2.0: Lack of Open-Source Community Engagements</h2>
<h3>Outcome: Open-source models help to reduce barriers to entry and expansion and facilitate collaboration.</h3><br/>

<table style={{border:"1px solid black", borderCollapse:"collapse"}}>
  <tr>
    <td style= {{border:"1px solid black", borderCollapse:"collapse", padding: "0px 15px 0px"}}>
      <b className="c-secondary">6.2.1\) Question</b><br/>

    </td>
    <td style= {{border:"1px solid black", borderCollapse:"collapse", padding: "0px 15px 0px"}}>
      <b className="c-secondary">Relation to Outcome</b><br/>

    </td>
